Text: thnx for that mate! what programm do i use?cant open it ..

To open this file I would recommend CDisplay.  There are other comic book viewers out there but this is the one I use.  Its freeware and easy and straight forward.  Simply Google CDisplay and download and install the file.  You'll then be able to open any .cbr/.cbz file and read the contents.
If the files are ".cbr", you can simply rename the extension to ".rar". Then extract all the images and view them however you like. All you need is WinRar
